adjectives.description: debatable (comparative more debatable, superlative most debatable)

entries.meaning: Open to debate; not fully proved or confirmed.
examples: Those data are debatable: no one has been able to replicate them.
It's debatable whether he is the best candidate for the position.

entries.meaning: Able to be debated; up for discussion.
examples: The lack of bonuses this year is not debatable.

entries.meaning: A topic that is open to debate.
examples: Just how many glaucoma patients there are in the United States and just how prevalent is the disease are two unknowns or at least two debatables.
